node.title: How much does cyber insurance cost?

excerpt.excerpt: If you've been thinking about cyber insurance but are unsure of the cost, check out our guide which explains - it might be cheaper than you think.
Cyber insurance is a relatively modern form of insurance which protects businesses and entrepreneurs from internet-based risks such as hacking, cyber fraud, data loss or destruction (among others).
Not just another type of insurance, cyber insurance protects you and your business from modern day threats. Do you need cyber insurance? Find out here.
